entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 p.m. PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 3:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over southern sections before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over southern sections. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
